--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> ooC: Hmmm? I was trying to help him out Kyle. There is a few things 
> that need to be done if someone wants something to happen. One of 
> which is posting for your actions. A Ship landing on the planet is a 
> pretty major thing. =P I don't feel that I was harsh... I was trying 
> for constructive criticism. =)
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: Cut the guy a break he's new.  I just don't want to be a 
> > hypocrite about complaining no one gave me a break.
> > 
> > BIC:  TT sees the ship crashing, goes to Rhino mode, and heads 
> > towards it.
> > 
> > Daydream and NM head in the general direction of South.
> > 
> > Transmutate comes to and heads for the Geotron base at long last
